name: Learn Japanese-Hiragana-Romaji
description:
The easiest and most fun way to learn Japanese language.

Is the easiest and most fun way to learn Japanese language.

With our app, you and your kids can learn Japanese quickly.

Learn Japanese alphabets playing!

Learn Japanese alphabets with cards and quiz / test !!

We make it easy with memory game addictive designed to learn.

You'll learn to write and read Japanese.

------------- FEATURES --------------

- You can check your option multiple-choice quiz.

- Randomly generated questions presented each time.

- You can play Hiragana and Katakana game memory.

- Help you to organize your memory.

- Learning algorithms to maximize memorization, retention.

- It will be helpful to memorize alphabets/syllabary meaning.

- Let's learn Japanese Hiragana and Katakana with lots of fun!

- Very easy to play!

- Learn step by step, start with simple questions, then move to the next level.

- Between stages you can play a memory game!

- Keep tracking of your learning progress

Please give us feedbacks so that we can improve this app!
